about.title: Our Mezcal
about.subtitle: A source of inspiration, because there are moments when you just need good advice to dare to do what you're passionate about.

content: When you drink mezcal, each sip evokes traits of its place of origin, each glass tells aspects of the identity of a people full of diversity and color.

With designation of origin in 9 regions of Mexico, Oaxaca produces more than 80% nationally. Mezcal production directly impacts the well-being of rural communities, generating opportunities and sources of dignified employment for thousands of families, keeping them together, without the need to emigrate to seek better sources of income.
Mezcal is much more than a spirituous beverage, it is present in places, in memories, in stories, in music, in gastronomy.
Thanks to a work of revalorization and dignification, today mezcal has gained ground in the world of cocktails and beverages, becoming present throughout the world.
A process of years of work and tradition

With more than 20 years in the art of distilling mezcal; adventurous and passionate, he follows the tradition of the craft his father taught him, working the same lands with respect and care, perfecting his techniques and learning.
There is no secret, just hard work and years of experience. A man of rituals, a sensitive and wise man.
Author of the first batch of Mezcal Consejo.
Chichic is "bitter" and apan, "in the water" Its toponymy has been interpreted as "River of bitterness"; also said "In bitter water".

Chichicápam was one of the most important commercial centers due to its strategic location in the middle of zones and towns of the central valleys, which made it a necessary passage to the destinations we now know as the Isthmus region and Miahuatlán.
Currently its main economic activity is mezcal production.

The product speaks for itself. Max is very strict at every stage of the process, cultivating agave naturally and organically, without pesticides or chemical fertilizers; respecting maturation times, to cut at the precise moment and obtain the optimal amount of sugars.

To distill a clean, quality mezcal. In the graduation of the final product is the author's touch. Real mezcal is graduated above 40° the challenge is to reach a light and delicate flavor, maintaining the character and strength of mezcal.
Discovering Max's mezcal was a revelation, the task, making it known to the world. The responsibility was great; we had to do something amazing to be at the same level.
So we gathered efforts and visions to create a concept aligned with art, feeling, and Mexican imagination, to be able to offer a unique experience. An unforgettable experience, like good advice.
